# Yield One

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="320"
  height="50"
  type="yieldone"
  data-pubid="0214"
  data-pid="31480"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact [YieldOne](https://yieldone.com/service/contact/media/index.php) or email: `y1dev@platform-one.co.jp`.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-pubid`
-   `data-pid`
